alert.note: Alert for Bossier; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 06 at 11:08AM CDT until further notice by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Shreveport LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following bayou in Louisiana... Bodcau Bayou At Bayou Bodcau Lake affecting Webster and Bossier Parishes. For the Bodcau Bayou...including Bayou Bodcau Lake...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bodcau Bayou At Bayou Bodcau Lake. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 168.3 feet. - Forecast...The bayou is expected to rise above flood stage Monday afternoon and continue rising to 174.0 feet Sunday, April 16. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 172.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 1115 AM CDT.
